DocAttribute.Name: Coordinates
DocAttribute.Documentation: The first, second, and third coordinate of the point location. If placed in a two or three dimensional rectangular Cartesian coordinate system, Coordinates[1] is the X coordinate, Coordinates[2] is the Y coordinate, and Coordinates[3] is the Z coordinate.

DocWhereRule.Name: CP2Dor3D
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Only two or three dimensional points are in scope.
